item.title: 欧洲银行面临应对重大贸易冲击的考验
item.description: 欧洲银行是否有能力抵御假想的全球贸易分裂所带来的影响，将受到考验，表现不佳的公司可能面临股东分红的压力。【原文：European banks will be tested on their ability to withstand fallout from a hypothetical fragmenting of global trade, with firms that fare badly potentially facing pressure on shareholder payouts.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德房地产投资信托基金连续第二次亏损，称市场正在好转
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）面向富裕人士的房地产基金连续第二年录得年度亏损，但年末业绩有所回升。【原文：A Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. property fund for wealthy individuals recorded its second consecutive annual loss, but ended the year on a stronger note.】

item.title: 加拿大企业乐观情绪升温，但特朗普威胁引发风险
item.description: 加拿大央行对企业的调查显示，在面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策之前，加拿大经济已接近稳定。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s survey of businesses painted a picture of an economy that’s close to finding its footing before facing US President Donald Trump’s trade policies that may potentially destabilize it.】

item.title: 欧洲央行武契奇认为价格风险均衡，市场投注合理
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，目前通胀风险是平衡的，投资者对利率走向的看法是合理的。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Boris Vujcic said inflation risks are currently balanced and investor views on where interest rates are headed are reasonable.】

item.title: 安信银行首席执行官称印度央行将 "慢慢来 "捍卫卢比
item.description: 据 Axis Bank Ltd. 的首席执行官称，尽管卢比大幅贬值，但印度央行不太可能对卢比采取强有力的保护措施。【原文：India’s central bank is unlikely to mount a strong defense of the rupee despite the currency’s sharp depreciation, according to Axis Bank Ltd.’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 多诺霍说：欧洲需要就德拉吉报告采取更紧急的行动
item.description: 一位欧元区高级官员说，欧盟需要加快提高竞争力的步伐，并落实欧洲央行行长马里奥-德拉吉提出的一些建议。【原文：The European Union needs to accelerate its efforts to boost its competitiveness and implement some of the recommendations made by European Central Bank president Mario Draghi, a senior euro-area official said.】

item.title: 制裁后俄罗斯重要港口油轮积压增加
item.description: 俄罗斯重要石油港口科兹米诺附近积压的油轮越来越多，这是美国全面制裁对俄罗斯出口造成破坏的最新迹象。【原文：A backlog of tankers is growing near Russia’s key oil port of Kozmino, the latest sign of disruption being wrought on the nation’s exports by sweeping US sanctions.】

item.title: 罗森伯格称加拿大应避免打赢不了的贸易战
item.description: 经济学家戴维-罗森伯格（David Rosenberg）说，如果加拿大对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能征收的关税采取报复措施，那么加拿大在贸易战中留下的伤疤将比美国深得多。【原文：Canada would emerge from a trade war with much deeper scars than the US should it retaliate against Donald Trump’s potential tariffs, economist David Rosenberg said.】

item.title: No. 2 南非政党抨击54亿美元黑人基金计划
item.description: 南非第二大党批评贸易部长计划启动一个 1000 亿兰特（54 亿美元）的基金，通过对现有企业的利润征税来促进黑人企业的发展。【原文：South Africa’s second-biggest party criticized the trade minister’s plan to start a 100 billion-rand ($5.4 billion) fund to boost Black-owned businesses by taxing existing firms’ profit.】

item.title: 南非戈东瓦纳有望在 2027 年摆脱垃圾级地位
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，南非可能会在两年内重新获得投资级信用评级。【原文：South African may be able to regain an investment-grade credit rating within two years, Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said.】

item.title: 了解金砖国家及其日益增长的影响力
item.description: 由新兴市场大国组成的金砖国家集团（BRICS）已从二十年前一家投资银行的口号变成了一个控制着多边贷款机构的现实世界俱乐部。它由 10 个成员国组成，将几个主要的能源生产国与一些发展中国家中最大的消费国结合在一起。在美国主导的世界里，该集团不断壮大自己的队伍，增强自己的经济影响力。【原文：The BRICS group of emerging-market powers — the acronym stands for Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa — has gone from a slogan dreamed up at an investment bank two decades ago to a real-world club that controls a multilateral lender. Comprising 10 member states, it pairs several major energy producers with some of the biggest consumers among developing countries. The group has been increasing its ranks, enhancing its economic clout in a US-dominated world.】

item.title: 胡塞武装称美国和英国船只可安全通过红海航道
item.description: 胡塞武装表示，他们将停止袭击红海海域的美国和英国船只，以响应以色列-哈马斯停火协议。【原文：The Houthis said they will stop attacking US and UK vessels in the Red Sea area in response to the Israel-Hamas ceasefire agreement, following a more than year-long campaign that’s upended global trade.】

item.title: 汇丰据称将探索在澳大利亚发展个人银行业务的各种选择
item.description: 据知情人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在研究澳大利亚消费银行业务的各种选择，包括可能的出售，因为该银行希望进一步缩减业务。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is studying options for its consumer banking business in Australia including a potential sale as the bank looks to further slim down its operations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Meta 将 "暂时 "在美国境外保留事实核查人员
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 公司全球业务主管尼古拉-门德尔松（Nicola Mendelsohn）表示，即使 Instagram 和 Facebook 的所有者在美国国内取消了这一做法，该公司 "目前 "仍将继续在美国境外使用事实核查工具。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will continue to use its fact checkers outside of the US “for now” even as the Instagram and Facebook owner does away with the practice at home, the company’s head of global business Nicola Mendelsohn said.】

item.title: 文字实录撼动英国的美国活动家
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money.

上阅读Saba Capital的Boaz Weinstein和资深记者John Stepek之间的对话。【原文：

Read the conversation between Saba Capital’s Boaz Weinstein and senior reporter John Stepek on Merryn Talks Money.

item.title: 通用汽车加拿大公司总裁表示，特朗普关税将损害美国主要汽车买家的利益
item.description: 美国通用汽车公司加拿大分部负责人表示，唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁将损害美国的经济利益，因为这将扰乱美国强大的汽车供应链，并推高消费者价格。【原文：Donald Trump’s tariff threats stand to hurt American economic interests because they would disturb automotive supply chains where the US is strong and drive up consumer prices, said the head of General Motors Co.’s Canadian unit.】

item.title: 中国炼油企业抢购欧洲石油，因为俄罗斯限制石油出口
item.description: 在美国最近针对俄罗斯石油实施制裁后，亚洲加工企业扩大了对替代油桶的寻找，中国炼油企业增加了对北海和地中海原油的采购。【原文：Chinese refiners boosted purchases of crude oil from the North Sea and the Mediterranean, as Asian processors widen their search for replacement barrels following the recent US sanctions targeting Russian oil.】

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席科特奇预计总统选举后将降息
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会成员 Ludwik Kotecki 表示，波兰央行可能会在 7 月总统大选后启动降息，并有可能在今年将基准利率下调整整一个百分点。【原文：Poland’s central bank may kick off interest rate cuts in July, after presidential elections, and has room to slash the benchmark by a full percentage point this year, Monetary Policy Council member Ludwik Kotecki said.】

item.title: 匈牙利，伊格尔山庄称布达佩斯迪拜式枢纽项目正在进行中
item.description: 匈牙利政府将布达佩斯市中心附近的土地出售给阿布扎比开发商 Eagle Hills Properties LLC，作为允许建造欧盟最高建筑的交易的一部分。【原文：Hungary’s government sold land near the center of Budapest to Abu Dhabi-based developer Eagle Hills Properties LLC as part of a deal that will allow the construction of the tallest buildings in the European Union.】

item.title: 华盛顿能源游说者对特朗普的真实看法
item.description:
与乔-拜登不同，即将上任的总统公开支持化石燃料。但美国石油和天然气行业仍然看到了未来的风险。【原文：

Unlike Joe Biden, the incoming president is overtly pro-fossil fuels. But the US oil and gas industry still sees risks ahead.

】

item.title: 英格兰银行 PRA 为里夫斯提供有利于增长的政策建议
item.description: 英格兰银行的监管部门提出了一系列可以满足政府促进经济增长要求的想法，其中包括为进入英国市场的外国公司提供新的 "管家服务"，以及简化制定新规则的流程。【原文：The Bank of England’s regulatory arm set out a string of ideas that could meet the government’s call to boost economic growth, including a new “concierge service” for foreign firms entering the UK market and streamlining the process for creating new rules.】

item.title: 本周卢布走势将如过山车，交易商押注更多损失
item.description: 随着美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的上任，加元将迎来疯狂的一周，交易员们都在为美国出口产品被征收关税做准备。【原文：Canada’s dollar is heading for a wild week as US President-elect Donald Trump assumes office, with traders prepping for tariffs being slapped on the country’s exports.】

item.title: 美国各州对比特币储备的喧嚣有可能只是噪音
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）支持建立国家 "战略 "比特币储备，各州与其坐以待毙，不如自己动手。【原文：Instead of waiting to see whether Donald Trump follows through on his endorsement of a national “strategic’ Bitcoin stockpile, states are taking matters into their own hands.】

item.title: 菲律宾计划今年在全球销售 35 亿美元债券
item.description: 菲律宾财政部长表示，全球不确定性加剧可能促使政府在继续降息的同时增加国内借贷，因此菲律宾计划今年出售 35 亿美元的海外债务，低于去年。【原文：The Philippines plans to sell $3.5 billion in overseas debt this year, lower than last year, as heightened global uncertainties may prompt the government to borrow more domestically as rate cuts continue, according to its finance chief.】

item.title: 习近平呼吁采取积极宏观政策保持中国发展势头
item.description: 习近平主席呼吁中国今年实施更加积极的宏观经济政策，以保持增长势头，因为世界第二大经济体可能面临美国新的关税。【原文：President Xi Jinping called for China to implement more proactive macroeconomic policies this year to maintain growth momentum as the world’s No. 2 economy could be facing new US tariffs.】

item.title: 肯尼亚将放弃 364 天票据，到期日集中在短期
item.description: 肯尼亚计划停止发行一年期国库券，转而发行较长期限的证券，以减少到期短期票据的数量。【原文：Kenya plans to halt the issuance of yearlong Treasury bills in favor of longer-dated securities to reduce the amount of maturing short-term paper.】

item.title: 任天堂借鉴索尼模式推出新 Switch
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Takashi Mochizuki 将分析任天堂保守的 Switch 2 首次亮相的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Takashi Mochizuki breaks down the implications of Nintendo’s conservative Switch 2 debut.】

item.title: 特朗普将启动国家紧急状态，大举征收关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第一任总统任期颠覆了全球经济的管理规则，他改变了美国援引国家安全的时间和方式，采用了广泛的经济安全概念，将从加拿大铝到欧洲汽车等广泛的事物置于他的关税视线之内。这一次，他似乎准备在重启贸易战的同时，重新定义美国的国家紧急状态概念。【原文：Donald Trump’s first presidency upended the rules governing the global economy as he shifted when and how America invokes national security by embracing a broad concept of economic security that put a wide range of things from Canadian aluminum to European cars in the sights of his tariffs. This time he appears ready to redefine America’s concept of a national emergency as he reboots his trade wars.】

item.title: 巴西分析师上调 2026 年关键利率和通胀率预期
item.description: 巴西经济学家上调了明年年底的基准利率和通货膨胀率预测，因为包括货币疲软在内的各种因素使得消费价格压力难以控制。【原文：Brazil economists raised their forecasts for the benchmark interest rate and inflation at the end of next year as factors including a weak currency make consumer price pressures hard to tame.】

item.title: 印度 Zomato 公司利润受超高速送货拖累
item.description: Zomato Ltd. 上一季度的利润下降了 57%，原因是竞争加剧和业务投资增加导致其快速配送部门的亏损扩大。【原文：Zomato Ltd.’s profit dropped 57% last quarter, as losses in its rapid delivery unit widened due to increased competition and higher investments into the business.】
